meanings.definition: Of or relating to an imide.
meanings.sent1: The imidic compound had a unique smell.
meanings.sent2: Her imidic research focused on imides in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The imidic joke made everyone laugh at the science fair.
meanings.sent4: His imidic creativity knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The imidic color of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.sent1: The imidic substance reacted with the reagent.
meanings.sent2: The imidic structure of the molecule was crucial for its function.
meanings.sent3: She wore an imidic hat to the party, causing quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The imidic bond between them was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The imidic taste of the dish lingered on his palate long after the meal.
